items.sentence: Don't speak to me about Tom. We're on bad terms.

Tom and I'd never done that by ourselves before.
Tom and I don't do that by ourselves very often.
Tom said he was really glad Mary didn't do that.
Tom thinks doing that would be a very good idea.

Tom told everyone that he was afraid to do that.
Tom thinks that he's smarter than everyone else.
Tom told me he was very hungry when he got home.

Mary bought herself three new dresses last week.

I hope this fine weather lasts till the weekend.
